explains: n. 英勇；超凡技术；勇猛

sentences.en: In all deeds of prowess as well as in large schemes of war Richard shone.
sentences.cn: 在一切英勇的行动和大规模的战争计划中，理查德都大放异彩。

sentences.en: He's always bragging about his prowess as a hunter.
sentences.cn: 他老是吹嘘自己作为猎手的高超技能。

sentences.en: Mr Obama's fundraising prowess gives him momentum.
sentences.cn: 奥巴马非凡的资金募集表现给了他力量。
